text: Samat Merdenuly Daniyar (; born 24 January 1999) is a Kazakhstani ice hockey player. He played for the Barys Astana in the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL). He also played for the Kazakhstani national team. He also played for the Kazakhstan team at the 2021 IIHF World Championship. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani sportspeople Category:Ice hockey defencemen Category:Competitors at the 2025 Asian Winter Games
title: Samat Daniyar
